description: Demonstrates human-in-the-loop with multiple inputs. Gathers topic and audience from human, then writes a tailored article. Each ask_human response is stored in state.{phase_name}.

phases.name: get_topic
phases.instructions: Ask the human what topic they would like an article about. Use ask_human with a friendly, open-ended question.

phases.name: get_audience
phases.instructions: Ask the human who the target audience is for this article (e.g., beginners, experts, general public). Use ask_human.

phases.name: write_article
phases.instructions:
Write an article about '{{ state.get_topic }}' tailored for the audience: '{{ state.get_audience }}'.

Adjust the tone, complexity, and examples based on the target audience.
